name: Odlo Performance Light Crew Baselayer Singlet - Women's
description: When hot and sweaty isn't an option. This lightweight performance base layer singlet has integrated ventilation throughout body to help keep you cool and move sweat away. Plenty of stretch lets you reach and move freely.Made of moisture wicking polyester and nylon that breathes well and dries quickly.Elastane content stretches for unrestricted movement.Seamless mesh zones vent excess heat.
